hints.content: When we skip count by tens,  we add $10$ to each number as we count.

Tom started with $329$,  so we need to add $10$ more to $329$.

$329 + 10 = 339$

The next number Tom will say is $339$.

Tom is still skip counting by ten so we need to add $10$ to $339$.

$339 + 10 = 349$

The next number Tom will say is $349$.

question.content:
Tom starts counting at $329$. He counts by tens.

**What two numbers does Tom count next?**
